QuestData.Title: The Sanctum of the Prophets
QuestData.Description: The mad prophets of the Twilight's Hammer congregate in the area just north of the Ascendant's Rise.$B$BIt is said that their dark visions are granted to them directly by the Old Gods. Whether or not that is true, they provide tremendous spiritual guidance to the cult. Attacking the Sanctum of the Prophets will deal a devastating blow to the enemy's morale and if we're lucky you might run into one of the Firelord's own emissaries while you're there.
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay 4 Twilight Augurs, 4 Twilight Retainers and 1 Emissary of Flame at the Sanctum of the Prophets.
QuestData.RewardText: You continue to prove your prowess, $n. At this rate Hyjal might survive this ordeal after all.
